pr_title: SAK-43978 - Library - expanded hsl color palette

timeline.message: SAK-43978 Library WIP expanded hsl color palette
SAK-43978 Library WIP expanded hsl color palette
SAK-43978 Library WIP expanded hsl color palette

timeline.bodyText: Let's set this info-color like the others rather than depending on the skin's main colour.
timeline.author: fostersdesign

replies.bodyText: I wasn't sure how far to go with the light theme in this PR. Ideally, the move to support multiple themes would mean a large amount of changes in _defaults that I hadn't planned for this PR. I'm happy to adjust a few more colors in this PR, but was thinking about doing the bulk of it in https://jira.sakaiproject.org/browse/SAK-43981
replies.author: profmikegreene

replies.bodyText: Maybe I should change that JIRA to be broader theme support rather than dark theme specific.
replies.author: profmikegreene

timeline.bodyText: Do we need this line of comments? Does it have any meaning to us?
timeline.author: fostersdesign
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,401 @@
+// Color contrast
+// See https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/pull/30168
+
+// A list of pre-calculated numbers of pow(($value / 255 + .055) / 1.055, 2.4). (from 0 to 255)
+// stylelint-disable-next-line scss/dollar-variable-default, scss/dollar-variable-pattern

replies.bodyText: I think it's important to leave the bootstrap PR link in for attribution and reference.
replies.author: profmikegreene

timeline.bodyText: Do we need this line of comments?
timeline.author: fostersdesign

replies.bodyText: I left all the comments from bootstrap in. I think as long as we keep the reference to their PR so we can backtrack where the code came from, we can remove whatever isn't relevant to us.
replies.author: profmikegreene

timeline.bodyText: Do we need this line of comments?
timeline.author: fostersdesign

timeline.bodyText: Do you need to pass in the dark-to-light range into the function for the purples and reds like you did above?
timeline.author: fostersdesign

replies.bodyText: This might have been an after affect of my bad rebase, I'll fix this.
replies.author: profmikegreene

timeline.bodyText: Should the $primary-color-highContrast and $primary-color-shadow have different colour values?
timeline.author: fostersdesign

replies.bodyText: I couldn't find the $primary-color-shadow being referenced anywhere in the project, so I removed it.
replies.author: profmikegreene
